DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe and North America. The aim of this clinical trial is to assess and compare the effect of insulin detemir in combination with liraglutide and metformin versus liraglutide and metformin in subjects with type 2 diabetes. Subjects will continue their own pre-trial metformin treatment during the trial.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Insulin Detemir in Combination With Liraglutide and Metformin Compared to Liraglutide and Metformin in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
